program.name: nose
program.install:
_pyexe=python [ -x ${SB_VAR_PYTHON}/bin/python3 ] && _pyexe=python3 ${SB_VAR_PYTHON}/bin/${_pyexe} setup.py install --skip-build \ --root / --install-lib=${_libdir} \ --prefix=${_binman-${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}}
# install path for Python's include.paths.d ${SB_PATH_INSTALL} -m 755 -o root -g 0 -d \ ${_libdir}/include.paths.d cat >${_libdir}/include.paths.d/99-${SB_PROG_NAME} <<_EOT_ ${_libdir} _EOT_
